EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_CloudFoundryWorkshop_MN_Q214.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Hands-on with Cloud Foundry PaaS June 3 in Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://gopivotal.com>
PIVOTAL LIVE EVENT!
Pivotal CF: Hands-On PaaS Workshop with James Watters
Interested in learning about “Platform as a Service” (PaaS) and how it can change the way you develop, deploy, and scale applications for the “Cloud Generation?”
Join the Pivotal engineering team for this free hands-on workshop while you network with peers and build some new skills.
Who Should Attend? This workshop is geared to application developers, enterprise architects, and anyone who wants to get hands-on experience developing an app in a PaaS environment. See the lab modules and topics <http://play.gopivotal.com/CFWorkshop_MN_Register.html> we'll cover.
Join us for one of the following sessions:
SESSION 1: 8:00 AM – Registration 8:30 AM – 11:30 AM – Hands on workshop 11:30 AM – 1:00 PM – Lunch and keynote presentation
SESSION 2: 11:00 AM – Registration 11:30 AM – 1:00 PM – Lunch and keynote presentation 1:30 PM – 4:30 PM – Hands on workshop
Register <http://play.gopivotal.com/CFWorkshop_MN_Register.html> your interest to see if you qualify for one of these exclusive sessions. The workshop is FREE; space is limited.
TUESDAY, JUNE 3, 2014 Minneapolis Marriott Southwest 5801 Opus Parkway Minnetonka, MN *Two Sessions Available
REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/CFWorkshop_MN_Register.html>
KEYNOTE PRESENTER James leads the product management, product marketing, business development, and solution engineering organization responsible for Pivotal's PaaS products.
<https://twitter.com/gopivotal> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> <https://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490/posts> <http://www.youtube.com/gopivotal>
www.gopivotal.com <http://gopivotal.com>
<http://gopivotal.com> Pivotal <http://gopivotal.com>, committed to open source and open standards, is a leading provider of application and data infrastructure software, agile development services, and data science consulting. Pivotal's revolutionary Enterprise PaaS product, Pivotal CF, powered by Cloud Foundry, is available now.
